title: TOWIE's Yazmin Oukhellou is every inch the business babe as she heads to her Essex boutique
text:
She has been through her fair share of heartache with beau James Lock.

Yet Yazmin Oukhellou has truly proved the only way is up as she was seen on Tuesday preparing to launch her new Essex boutique, where she was joined by pals Clelia Theodorou, Chloe Meadows and Chloe Brockett.

The entrepreneur, 25, opted for a chic tailored gown which showed off her tiny waist and endless legs while her pal Clelia, 24, was larking around in the window of her boutique and acting as a human mannequin.

Hot stuff: Yazmin Oukhellou has truly proved the only way is up as she was seen on Tuesday preparing to launch her new Essex boutique

Yazmin looked sensational in her wine coloured gown which boasted an aysymettric hemline and a cinched in waist.

She was showing off her endless legs with the short hemline while also boosting them with the help of a pair of sky high Christian Louboutin heels.

Clelia was looking more casual but equally sensational as she donned a black mini dress and white fluffy cardigan for a warm wintery touch.

Hot on her heels was Chloe, who looked stunning in a white shirt, which she gave a sexy touch by tying at her waist to give a hint of abs.

Swing it, shake it, move it, make it! The entrepreneur, 25, opted for a chic tailored gown which showed off her tiny waist and endless legs while her pal Clelia, 24, was larking around in the window of her boutique and acting as a human mannequin

This old thing? Yazmin looked sensational in her wine coloured gown which boasted an aysymettric hemline and a cinched in waist

Yazmin is preparing to open her boutique in Hoddesdon on Friday November 1 where she will sell women's clothes and also offer personal styling sessions.

It comes after Yazmin's ex James was pictured locking lips with Ellie McKenzie as the duo put on a passionate display during a recent night out in Essex.

The star has been left less than impressed by his recent antics, due to the fact she is apparently friends with the girl he was seen snogging.

A vision: Clelia looked stunning in her simple yet sophisticated ensemble as she stepped out

Ha! Clelia was having a giggle as she stood in the window

The whole gang: Clelia strutted in with Joey Turner on her arm

During a recent episode of TOWIE, Yazmin is set to reveal to a group of her gal pals that she was left upset after seeing snaps of James with his new love interest.

Broaching the topic of James' snog, Courtney Green asks: 'Yaz have you seen those pictures of Locky and that girl online?' While Chloe chimes in: 'I wasn't going to say it to you, was going to wait until you brought it up.'

Yaz candidly admits: 'I did get a little bit upset, not because James is moving on with someone, but this girl was messaging me last week asking me to go for dinner and asking for my boob surgeon.

Apparently confused over the girls' intentions, she adds: 'What does she want new boobs for James to look at that look exactly like mine? I don't know what this girl's issue is.'

All white? Hot on her heels was Chloe, who looked stunning in a white shirt, which she gave a sexy touch by tying at her waist to give a hint of abs

Happy days: Chloe Brockett wore head-to-toe black with chic accessories

Attempting to make sense of the situation, Chloe says: 'So you know her?' Yaz replies: 'I know her! I messaged the girl, I maybe said some things I shouldn't have said.

'But we all know what I'm like. She tried to lie and say it was like a drunken kiss thing that they just met out as a group.'

The brunette beauty goes on to insist that she is fine with James moving on without her, and even adds that the girl is welcome to her plastic surgeon as well.

Pain: She has been through her fair share of heartache with beau James Lock
description: The entrepreneur, 25, opted for a chic tailored gown which showed off her tiny waist and endless legs while her pal Clelia, 24, was larking around in the window
